attributes.action: No cut on summer holidays and not have longer school days!
attributes.additional_details: It would be nice if things don’t change majorly,yes we understand it’s for the kids future but using our summer holidays will not justify to this. Having longer days in school is being unproductive and unhealthy for the adults and kids. Schools should operate the way it has been before the virus (the hours) and find more suitable and easier ways to catch up with school work such as now allowing homework!
attributes.background: Let the adults and kids have their full summer holidays.To not take away that time from us to catch up with education. To also not have longer school days as that will not be healthy for the adults or kids especially around this virus time. Things should be as normal as possible without major change

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
